PaperFaces iPad Project

Home Ã— PaperFaces Portraits

PaperFaces was an illustration project by designer Michael Rose â€” hey thatâ€™s me! For two years I drew the faces of strangers everyday using an iPad, a stylus, and Paper by FiftyThree. I occasionally post new portraits here, but certainly not as frequently as I used to.

If you scroll down far enough you can see how my technique evolved from faceless gestures into realistic portraits1.
